# Fixing an issue with data/metadata

## 🧭 Explore data scenarios

Browse [data scenarios](data-scenarios.qmd) and select one which interests your
group.


## 🛠️ Resolve at least one scenario

Build a Jupyter Notebook that resolves a scenario.

Commit your solution notebook to your GitHub repository.


## 👐 Consider your group's selected dataset

Does your chosen dataset have issues that need fixing? Explore those issues in
a Jupyter Notebook.

Commit your notebook to your GitHub repository.
